Articles.Content: I'm trying to place a lander on top of my existing rocket, but it won't place it. I've tried placing decouplers and docking ports but nothing is letting me attach to it. ( note: on ps4 )
Does your lander have a free node at the bottom? If not then try making the part you want to attach the root part - you can do this even if its placed off the craft and so greyed.
Thank you! Worked like a dream!
I'd turn the lander as a whole into a subassembly if possible
